SummaryEnglish: The adventures of four girls living together.

1.SummaryEnglish: Victoria gets her first taste of Chilean men; Isabella attends to her own needs; Julieta and Sara dance until daybreak.

2.SummaryEnglish: Sara takes her yoga practice to another level; Vicky discovers the delights of country living; Isabella consummates a musical fantasy.

3.SummaryEnglish: In preparation for their party, Isabella and Sara find ingredients for a scrumptious dinner while Victoria and Julieta unwind at the spa.

4.SummaryEnglish: Sara receives an invitation to a swinger party and her friends encourage her to attend. At the end all finish the night in the same place. There will be exchanges and surprises.

5.SummaryEnglish: Julieta's decision to explore virgin territory and act out her sexual fantasies takes all the girls by surprise, setting in motion a chain reaction.

6.SummaryEnglish: The four girls travel to the coast for a pleasurable weekend full of surprises at the beach, reliving old stories along the way. Sara indulges in virtual sex with a former Chilean lover now living in Paris

7.SummaryEnglish: The girls just want to have fun, and Celeste's birthday is the perfect excuse to explore the nightlife and sample the local delicacies.

8.SummaryEnglish: The four girls get their first job together as a group: a photo session with a very important Chilean fashion designer. Seduction and jealousy ensues.

9.SummaryEnglish: Sara resumes her amorous acquaintance with Benjamin, her friend and sexual guru who invites the girls to his casino. There they meet a handsome stranger and gamble to win his affection.

10.SummaryEnglish: Season One Finale. Isabella has to go back to Brazil, so the girls say goodbye the only way they know how: partying and giving free reign to their wanton desire.
